mapper.sql:
SELECT prmt_pk, prmt_tppr_pk, prmt_parametro, prmt_prto_pk
, prto_codigo, prto_codigo_corto
, prvr_pk, prvr_fini, prvr_ffin
, ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'prto' AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} AND i18n_ext_pk = prto_pk ) AS prto_nombre , ( CASE WHEN tppr_es_i18n = 1 THEN ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'prvr' AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} AND i18n_ext_pk = prvr_pk ) ELSE ( SELECT prdt_cadena FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND prdt_tpdt_pk = tppr_tpdt_pk ) END ) AS p18n_texto
FROM tbl_parametro_prmt INNER JOIN tbl_tipo_parametro_tppr ON tppr_pk = prmt_tppr_pk INNER JOIN tbl_parametro_version_prvr ON prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_puerto_prto ON prto_pk = prmt_prto_pk
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_parametro_prmt INNER JOIN tbl_parametro_version_prvr ON prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_puerto_prto ON prto_pk = prmt_prto_pk

if.test: prto != null and (prto.id != null or prto.ids != null)
(itdt.prmt != null and itdt.prmt.id != null) or itdt.cantidadDecimal or itdt.cantidadEntera != null or (itdt.cadena != null and !itdt.cadena.empty) or (itdt.cadenas != null and !itdt.cadenas.empty)

mapper.select: WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_subparametro_sprm WHERE sprm_prmt_dep_pk = prmt_pk AND sprm_tpsp_pk = #{tpspId} ) AND prmt_tppr_pk = ( SELECT tpsp_tppr_dep_pk FROM tbl_tipo_subparametro_tpsp WHERE tpsp_pk = #{tpspId} ) AND prmt_parametro LIKE #{textoBusqueda} ORDER BY prmt_tppr_pk, prmt_parametro

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_parametro_prmt INNER JOIN tbl_parametro_version_prvr ON prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk WHERE prmt_pk = #{id} AND ( #{version.fini} BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, #{version.fini}) OR COALESCE(#{version.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, portico.getSysdateTime()) BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, COALESCE(#{version.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, portico.getSysdateTime())) )
AND prvr_pk <> #{version.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_parametro_prmt(prmt_pk, prmt_tppr_pk, prmt_parametro, prmt_prto_pk) VALUES (#{id}, #{entiId}, #{parametro}, #{prto.id})
INSERT INTO tbl_parametro_version_prvr(prvr_pk, prvr_prmt_pk, prvr_fini, prvr_ffin) VALUES (#{version.id}, #{id}, #{version.fini}, #{version.ffin})
